name: Enviro Clad
Enviro Clad
Specification / Standard: Manufacturer's Technical Data Sheet / AS4654.1 - 2012
Batch Number
Record batch number
Prepare surface to accept primer using scraper (and/or light grind) and vacuum/sweep residual debris. Remove all concrete/mortar projections.
Attach Photo
Primer Application - Pending Substrate Condition, Apply Enviro Prime WB using a brush or roller
Attach Photo
Caulking - Apply Enviro Flex FC / PRO to the junction between floor slab and walls
Attach Photo
Membrane Application (1st coat) - Mix and Apply Enviro Clad as a first coat to the thicknesses prescribed by the specifications
Membrane Application (2nd coat) - Mix and Apply Enviro Clad as a second coat to the thicknesses prescribed by the specifications
Curing - Allow to cure in accordance with Manufacturers Specifications
Final Inspection and Sign-off. Visually inspect and ensure adequately cured - DO NOT PASS UNTIL HOLDPOINT COMPLETE BELOW
HOLD POINT - CLICK HERE TO REQUEST BUILDER SIGN OFF
Enviro Hydrostatic 1
Enviro Hydrostatic 1
Specification / Standard: Manufacturer's Technical Data Sheet / AS4654.1 - 2012
Batch Number
Record batch number
Prepare surface to accept primer using scraper (and/or light grind) and vacuum/sweep residual debris. Remove all concrete/mortar projections.
Attach Photo
Caulking - Apply Enviro Flex FC / PRO to the junction between floor slab and walls
Attach Photo
Primer application - Lightly Spray areas with water to receive Hydrostatic 1
Attach Photo

Membrane Application (1st coat) - Mix Enviro Hydrostatic 1 thoroughly using a mechanical mixer. Apply first coat of Enviro Hydrostatic 1 by brush or roller Use Enviro Joint Band in floor-wall junctions and general movement joints
Membrane Application (2nd coat) - Mix Enviro Hydrostatic 1 thoroughly using a mechanical mixer. Apply second coat of Enviro Hydrostatic 1 by brush or roller
Curing - Allow to cure in accordance with Manufacturers Specifications
Final Inspection and Sign-off. Visually inspect and ensure adequately cured - DO NOT PASS UNTIL HOLDPOINT COMPLETE BELOW
HOLD POINT - CLICK HERE TO REQUEST BUILDER SIGN OFF
